pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Collagen Peptide24 Cream 50g
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Regenerist Collagen Peptide 24 moisturiser is a fragrance free, creamy moisturiser enriched with Collagen Peptide and 99% Pure Grade Niacinamide. Unlike other collagen moisturisers, Olay Collagen Peptide 24 Moisturiser is designed with Collagen-Peptides that work just like naturally occuring Collagen in the skin which is easily absorbed to provide plump and bouncy skin all day long.

Size: 50g

KEY FEATURES

• Instantly plumps, visibly firms and smoothens fine lines with Collagen Peptide + Niacinamide that deeply penetrates^ into skin
• Hydrates skin for 24 hours long
• Creamy moisturiser to effectively lock skin's moisture
• No added parabens, phthalates, mineral oil and synthetic dyes
• ^Up to epidermis layer only

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Isohexadecane, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Isostearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Polyacrylamide, Panthenol, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Tapioca Starch, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethiconol, Laureth-7, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, PEG-100 Stearate, Titanium Dioxide, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, 1.2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol

Directions

Smooth evenly over cleansed face and neck before moisturizer, morning and night
